the bikes are lining up for the race .

output.sentences: It was a race to set up the controls to play the music for the race .
Before the race became, the bikes were lined up at the starting line .
The bikers tried to stay within the lines to avoid collisions .
Riding a bike that long will make anyone tired and ready for a break!
Before the awards were handed out,  a few of the bikers posed for a quick photo.
